title: Master Yi damaging bug on Fizz. Could be game changing bug

embed.description: Watch Fieerry's League of Legends video: master yi bug @Riot - Plays.tv

body: Riot please fix this, game changing bug.

replies.body: Fizz was late on the E, he already got hit by Alpha Strike thus the damage was already guaranteed.

That just seems bad as a mechanic. Does it also mean that if a Yi Alpha strikes and gets hit with another Alpha strike during his he will also receive dmg? Would it also apply to Elise?

On another note, what exactly are you planing to do for a fizz rework and are there going to be big changes to his passive? I haven't been able to get any information so far.
